abstract: Pop star Katy Perry and restaurateur and developer Dana Hollister are vying for eight-acre property in California controlled by Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Los Angeles; archdiocese favors all-cash deal from Perry and nuns supervising the sale prefer deal from Hollister that would keep property open to public; nuns have entered deal with Hollister, but archdiocese contends that purchase is contingent on approval of zoning and building department.
lead_paragraph: The Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Los Angeles favors a deal to sell an eight-acre property to Ms. Perry — over the objections of nuns who have another plan in mind.

headline.main: 2 Nuns, a Developer and Katy Perry Walk Into a Real Estate Deal
headline.print_headline: A Pop Star, 2 Nuns and a Developer Walk Into a Real Estate Deal

snippet: The Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Los Angeles favors a deal to sell an eight-acre property to Ms. Perry — over the objections of nuns who have another plan in mind.
